item.description:
FOOD SECURITY is one of the most important issues of our time and this is a GREAT opportunity to share what CT folks are doing in a public forum. Free & open to all to attend! Please spread the word.

Join us for a panel discussion with those passionate about LOCAL FOOD, GROWING THE LOCAL ECONOMY & COOPERATIVE RELATIONSHIPS! We will introduce concepts pertaining to cooperatives, Transition Town Initiatives, SLOW $$$, existing food distribution systems in CT and other related projects.
item.name: Sustainable Local Food Panel
